title: New:  Cloud Boat – Dréan
body:
**Cloud Boat** appear to have a successful year in front of them, at least if this second leak off their new double a-side single is anything to go by.

Graceful, composed and at times world shattering, the second cut _Dréan_, has something of the much hyped **James Blake** about it. _Dréan_ is perhaps more welcoming however, the production is crisp with their successes coming from what they are willing to tell us, rather than what they withhold.

Preorder the single, due out on March 4 [HERE.](http://randsrecords.greedbag.com/buy/wanderlustdran-0/) Stream the 2 tracks below.
